title: Morocco knockout Spain in penalties. Truly the world cup of underdogs.

author: UzumakiYoku
text: They may have gotten lucky this time but they wonâ€™t make it passed the next round

text: People acting like Spain some huge favourites when they played to a similar level as Germany who everyone shat on

author: Mathmagician155
text: Fr they played with no passion or conviction

text: Yep lucky costa Rica was asleep still to let them get 7

author: UzumakiYoku
text: Spain simply doesnâ€™t have the attacking power to deal with a 10-man defense. In 2010 they won with only 8 goals total. But put Morocco against Mbappe, Neymar, Messi, or Ronaldo and theyâ€™ll fall apart.

author: Mathmagician155
text: I think Morocco has a chance against Portugal/Argentina.  But definitely not against France or Brazil

author: MarstoriusWins
text: Not if Portugal play like they are doing right now.

author: Mathmagician155
text: True. Portugal has a good attack but their defense lets them down sometimes

author: reda_89
text: To be fair, we didnt expect much from this game but we showed a great defence, dont let big names fool you like Ronaldo or Messi, they have been stopped before and we can stop them if we play like today. Hard Luck Spain

author: muckonium
text:
Lucky?

Spains 3 succesive eliminations in penal series suggest they lack firepower or quality to break down rivals that dont give them the space and time that Costa rica or Slovakia allowed them

author: UzumakiYoku
text: PKs are literally entirely luck.

author: Wooz1t
text: Defo not. A well slotted and/or powerful penalty is pretty much impossible to save

author: UzumakiYoku
text: Unless you correctly guess which way the ball will go.

author: Wooz1t
text: Have fun saving a 70mph bullet from 12 yards out lmfao. Its not fifa, you cant just dive in the right direction and the ball magically bounces out

author: PowerParty7
text: You definetly can a lot of times

author: Instrumedley2018
text: assuming then that is luck as you say, then why the fuck does your great team chose to go for it? Oh right, they didn't chose...they just have been consistently incompetent to score and win the match in regular time

author: Emergency_Arm_4599
text: Luck based ? Your team focused on ball possession and did nothing with it, and Bono catched every single penalty

author: UzumakiYoku
text: Yes. PKs are 90% luck. The keeper steps up to the goal already knowing which way they will dive. If you think you can react to a PK then you know nothing about this sport

author: Emergency_Arm_4599
text: The goalkeeper PREDICTS which way the opponent will shoot, and Bono did that successfully three times

author: UzumakiYoku
text: So you agree. Itâ€™s about luck. Cool. Glad we got that settled.
